document_data.mainbody:
essandra was a member of the Red Plumes of Hillsfar in the Moonsea in the late 15 century DR.
Circa Dessandra led a Red Plume patrol to a factory to retrieve the red dye that the Goodroots produced from the beet juice harvested on their farm. However, only Constance Goodroot, the daughter of the factorys owners, was there and the dye was not yet ready.
